SHOPCHEN
BRAND
This is a process of elaborate design for pictures to tell emotions and communicate with people. Words are a few, but blessings are unlimited. Opening a card, the charm in beautiful and simple expressions that touches people is only found in cards. Since Jean Card was established, we incessantly search for inspirations from daily life and use comprehensive materials and simple but refined craftsmanship to re-present precious moments for each card to recollect to your memories and stories.
